int.name: node_coordinates_connection
int.description: For nodes : node coordinates, then connection length, and distance in the poloidal plane to the nearest solid surface outside the separatrix

int.name: edge_areas
int.description: For edges : contains 3 surface areas after uniform extension in the third dimension of the edges. Geometry(1) and geometry(2) are the projections of that area along the local poloidal and radial coordinate respectively. Geometry(3) is the full surface area of the extended edge

int.name: face_indices_volume
int.description: For faces : coordinates indices (ix, iy) of the face within the structured grid of the code. The third element contains the volume after uniform extension in the third dimension of the faces

int.name: face_indices_volume_connection
int.description: For faces : coordinates indices (ix, iy) of the face within the structured grid of the code. The third element contains the volume after uniform extension in the third dimension of the faces. The fourth element is the connection length. The fifth element is the distance in the poloidal plane to the nearest solid surface outside the separatrix
